{{Disambiguation}}

'''Void''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{EnvLink|Void}}, empty space external to the buildable area in any [[dimension]].
* {{BiomeLink|The Void}}, an empty biome generating only in buffet world and a superflat preset called "The Void".
** {{EnvLink|Void start platform}}, the only structure that generates in that superflat preset.
*[[Void world]], a world type in ''[[Bedrock Editor]]''.
* [[Void fog]], a removed world feature that produced thick black fog near the bottom of the world.
* {{BlockLink|Void Air}}, a {{JE}}-exclusive variant of air.
* {{BlockLink|Structure Void}}, a block used to prevent existing blocks to be replaced by structures loaded by the [[structure block]].
* A 2x2 {{ItemLink|painting}} by Kristoffer Zetterstrand named "The void".
* {{ItemLink|Bottle of void}}, a joke item introduced in [[23w13a_or_b]].

=== Tutorials ===
* [[Tutorial:The Void|The Void]], a tutorial on reaching the void (in the first sense) in Survival mode.
